markdownRemark.html: Vince Bonfanti of New Atlanta will be presenting the next version of BlueDragon tonight at 6:30. The meeting will be held at Vurv Technology in Jacksonville. You can find meeting details here.

frontmatter.title: Vince Bonfanti speaking at the JaxFusion meeting tonight
